options.explain:
Attacks create a 50% chance of delivering a Fire attack, depending on your Fire Damage.
- 100 to below 150 Fire Damage: Fire Explosion
- 150 to below 250 Fire Damage: Infernal Road
- 250+ Fire Damage: Meteor
- Meteor Burns enemies on hit for 15 sec.
- Meteor increases Fire Resistance +20 and Skill Atk. +2% for 30 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 50% chance of delivering a Fire attack, depending on your Fire Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)
- 100 to below 150 Fire Damage: Fire Explosion (Inflicts 180% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 150 to below 250 Fire Damage: Infernal Road (Inflicts 230% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 250+ Fire Damage: Meteor (Inflicts 370% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Meteor Burns enemies on hit for 15 sec. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)
- Meteor increases Fire Resistance +20 and Skill Atk. +2% for 30 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)

options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Incoming damage -3% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.

Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Incoming damage -3% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)

- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.
